Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 8.1

Posted onSeptember 29, 2014December 30, 2014Leave a comment

Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 8.1 helps you troubleshoot and repair Windows-based computers. This includes those computers that cannot be started. DaRT 8.1 is a powerful set of tools that extend the Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE). By using DaRT, you can analyze an issue to determine its cause, for example, by inspecting the computer’s Read More …

Quest has released a new tool called the vWorkspace Desktop Optimizer. The tool contains Quests knowledge on how to optimize a Virtual Desktop, and although it is especially written for vWorkspace its also applicable to Citrix XenDesktop and VMware View. Posted onSeptember 23, 2014December 30, 2014Leave a comment

Summary The VMware OS Optimization Tool helps optimize Windows 7/8/2008/2012 systems for use with VMware Horizon View. The optimization tool includes customizable templates to enable or disable Windows system services and features, per VMware recommendations and best practices, across multiple systems. HDX Monitor

Posted onSeptember 10, 2014December 30, 2014Leave a comment

The HDX Monitor tool is used to validate the operation and configuration of key features of XenDesktop’s and XenApp’s HDX stack including the latest HDX virtualization technologies like MediaStream for Flash and HDX RealTime features. Consequently, this tool can also help you diagnose and troubleshoot HDX issues. Its built-in expert system analyzes all captured data Read More …
